org.semanticweb.owl.align

Interface AlignmentRepairer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRepairer

    public interface AlignmentRepairer
    Represents an operator for repairing alignments and networks of alignments.
    Version:
    $Id: AlignmentRepairer.java 2102 2015-11-29 10:29:56Z euzenat $
    Author:
    Jérôme Euzenat

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(java.util.Properties param)
      Has to be invoked before using repair.
      Alignment repair(Alignment alignment, java.util.Properties param)
      Perform repair on the alignment.
      OntologyNetwork repair(OntologyNetwork network, java.util.Properties param)
      Perform repair on a whole network of ontologies.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(java.util.Properties param)
   throws AlignmentException
        Has to be invoked before using repair. May be used for initialising global structures. Known parameters (for both alignments and networks): - reasoner (hermit|pellet|elk): which reasoner is used
        Parameters:
        param: - set of properties expressing the parameters for this repairer
        Throws:
        AlignmentException - when something goes wrong

      • repair

        Alignment repair(Alignment alignment,
                 java.util.Properties param)
          throws AlignmentException
        Perform repair on the alignment. The ontology may be obtained from the values of getOntology1() and getOntology2() These are objects that may be URI, instance of Ontowrap or instances of OWLOntologies. Known parameters (for both alignments and networks): - postSATCheck (boolean): does the repairer performs a satisfiability check after repair - extractModules (boolean): does the repairer first extract modules - completeness (complete|efficient|bruteforce): is the reasoning complete or approximate - optimality (global|local|greedy|greedymin|globaliso): does the repairer look for particular optimum - entities (concepts|properties|conceptproperties): types of correspondences taken into account -
        Parameters:
        alignment: - the alignment to be repaired
        param: - specific repairing parameters as properties
        Returns:
        the repaired alignment
        Throws:
        AlignmentException - when something goes wrong

      • repair

        OntologyNetwork repair(OntologyNetwork network,
                       java.util.Properties param)
                throws AlignmentException
        Perform repair on a whole network of ontologies.
        Parameters:
        network: - the network of ontologies to be repaired
        param: - specific repairing parameters as properties
        Returns:
        the repaired network of ontologies
        Throws:
        AlignmentException - when something goes wrong
